meanings.sent1: The seriffed letters on the sign were easy to read.
meanings.sent2: The designer chose a seriffed font for the logo to make it look more professional.
meanings.sent3: The cat wore tiny glasses with seriffed frames, looking quite scholarly.
meanings.sent4: Her seriffed handwriting added a touch of elegance to the invitation.
meanings.sent5: The seriffed edges of the book cover caught the light, making it stand out on the shelf.

meanings.sent1: The seriffed newspaper article was easier to follow.
meanings.sent2: The menu was printed in a seriffed font for a classic look.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that even the aliens would appreciate a seriffed spaceship manual.
meanings.sent4: The seriffed headlines in the newspaper seemed to jump off the page.
meanings.sent5: The seriffed text on the poster gave it a timeless feel.
